name: SOG Zoom, 3.6" Folding Knife, Drop Point, Plain Edge, Black Aluminum Frame, AUS-

reviews.name: SOG Zoom, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: Wow! SOG got it right with this one. I love that the knife actually has a bit of weight. The new button release is definitely an improvement. I like that the safety is out of the way and it no longer changes positions in my pocket. Also, gotta love SOG's pocket clips. The blade design is both beautiful AND functional with no blade play. The jimping on this knife is wonderful, it really locks your thumb in place. And last but not least, the assisted opening on the zoom is super fast and solid, there is no wiggling or hesitation! This knife is a HUGE step in the right direction. Thank you SOG.
reviews.title: A step I the right direction

reviews.name: SOG Zoom, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: I bought this knife as a gift and the recipient loves it. The quality is unmatched. Thank you for building a great product.
reviews.title: Great knife.

reviews.name: SOG Zoom, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: This knife is great by all means. The term "razor sharp" falls short of actually describing it! The handles are great, and the deploying mechanism is lightning fast. Thanks SOG for making such an amazing knife!
reviews.title: Real Mechnical Beauty!

reviews.name: SOG Zoom, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: This knife immediately became my favorite SOG folder! Super fast on opening, very light and extremely sharp. Basically a perfect knife all around. No flaws, absolute perfection. I recommended it to a friend, he bought 2! I also bought 2..
reviews.title: super light, and fast!
